about_the_game:
FREE NEW MODE ADDED! CROWE: SURVIVAL ARENA

Continue the fight against a slew of updated enemy types in Crowe: Survival Arena! Fighting high above the valley floor, you must defend your lofty platform or teleport to another before it's destroyed beneath your feet. In "Survival Arena", switch between weapon types and teleport between platforms strategically while battling various enemy types.

Crowe: Experience Jayde

Those seeking a bit of respite from the constant action of Survival Arena can find their zen with Crowe: Expierence Jayde. In Experience Jayde, the player is able to visit passive environments around the world of Jayde that tease settings for future installments of the Crowe series.

Crowe: The Drowned Armory™ is the first installment in an episodic single-player, cinematic VR game experience. Solve room scale puzzles and engage in tactical bow and shield combat against a variety of enemy types, capabilities and sizes.

World:
Welcome to the mysterious, green planet of Jayde. A remote world unscathed by the galactic war that rages among the star systems nearby.
Jayde has remained hidden for 1000 years by an advanced orbital cloaking array. Now that cloaking technology has been damaged and the peaceful tribespeople on the surface suddenly fall victim to an alien invasion.

Gameplay:
In chapter one, The Drowned Armory, players will team up with A.M.I. (Artificial Maintenance Intelligence), a long-dormant techno-fairy. Use VR motion controls to fight off an armada of alien attackers using a powerful energy bow and mystical shield.

Help AMI restore power to an underwater reactor core, reactive a giant mechanized robot guardian and defeat the dragon that dwells at the bottom of the flooded, derelict temple… the Drowned Armory.

Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR

highlighted.name: It's Not Easy Being A God

detailed_description:
Free update! SURVIVAL ARENA out now!

FREE UPDATE! Survival Arena is out now!

We listened to the community feedback. Now continue the fight against a slew of updated enemy types in Crowe: Survival Arena features new environments and new enemy types! Fighting high above the valley floor, you must defend your lofty platform or teleport to another before it's destroyed beneath your feet. In "Survival Arena", switch between weapon types and teleport between platforms strategically while battling various enemy types.

New Weapon

Dual Cross Pistols (unlock after completion of Story Mode)
As the name suggests, the handling and rapid fire of a pistol combined with energy bolts fashioned after crossbow ammunition. The player can charge their shot creating an explosive ball of energy that explodes on impact or can be command detonated by firing a second round into the orb. The dual cross pistols are only available in Survival Arena mode.

Introducing Leaderboards
Thought your last run to level 15 was pretty amazing? Check the leaderboard and see where you stand. You can now compete against other players in Survival Arena with global leaderboards. Compete against friends and strangers to see who amongst you is the greatest defender of Jayde!

Crowe: Experience Jayde
Those seeking a bit of respite from the constant action of Survival Arena can find their zen with Crowe: Experience Jayde. In Experience Jayde, the player is able to visit passive environments around the world of Jayde. These six meditative spaces allow the player to peacefully exist within the fantasy space and see the world of Jayde at their own pace. The 10/5/17 release will include 6 different environments:

• Last Field of Honor
• Prayer Grotto
• The Riddling Canyon
• The Forgotten Temple
• Flooded City of the Creators
• Floating Cliffs

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6600K CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980, AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Room Scale 2m by 2m area required

short_description: Welcome to the vibrant and mysterious world of Crowe in VR now updated with a NEW BONUS MODE, Survival Arena! Room scale puzzles, tactical bow & shield combat, damage dealing magical cross-pistols and gorgeous cinematic visuals that will sweep you to an alien world where science fiction meets high fantasy!
